answers.answer: Wiv 1st baby i had it at 36 weeks n gt induced at 37 weeks
Just curious, how did you find out you had preeclampsia?
U av high bp bad headachnes blurrer vision swellin and wen they done u blood they can tell by it also u av protein in urine

I also had it with my first pregnancy which was a twin pregnancy.. I didn't know I had it until the day I went into the er for stomach pain at 35 weeks, after they did my vital signs, I had to have an emergency c section.. Put to sleep and everything
My blood pressure high n protein in pee. Got tablets try help lower it. May b induced at 36 weeks if still concerned then
Are they making you stay in?or can you go home?I am high risk for pre-eclampsia so curious as to know if you are allowed home

ive been sent home , its only mild , i have see local midwife thursday to check bp,,n if shes concerened she may send me in , n got hosp monday again she said she may deliever baby then, id imagine it all depends how bad ur bp is, ive had bloods sent off, im hoping i can go to at least 36 weeks,

My sister in law had a really rare/bad and fast paced case of pre-eclampsia and she was only 30 weeks when they found out she had it. They ended up taking her baby at 30 weeks and he was fine. He had to be in the NICU for some weeks but he fought through all of his challenges and is fine and gaining weight like he should! :) good luck to you and your little one!

I had pre-eclampsia when I was 35wks pregnant with my daughter. My doctor waited till I was 37wks then induced me. But all doctors are different and it depends how serious it is. Juat hang in there and everything will be alright.Good luck to you and your baby ((hugs))
Oh god hearing u all ladies i m worried as i m just 20 weeks and having swollen feets and ankles. Anyone else have seen or experienced swelling in 20 weeks are near? What was the outcome. Plz share.
Plz excuse the typing mistake.I mean 20 weeks or near?
I had it with my first pregnancy at 36wks induced at 37 after they tested the fluid around the baby to see if lungs were developed enough.
If your concerned see gp they will test for protein n high blood pressure. Thanks for the best wishes . Hope can last till 36 weeks at least
Yeah i have my appointment for tomorrow with my dr?Swhite 26 in which week u came to know u have preeclampsia?

question: Hey girls . Just in hosp there's a chance I have preeclampsia. Im 35 weeks tomorrow . Just wondering has anyone had it at this stage were u induced now or left till at least 37 ?
title: preeclampsia?
